TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataSourceDescriptor extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Implements the basic functionality required by a single data source at the `EnvDTE.Project` level.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor"> class.
When overridden in a derived class, closes this stream and the underlying stream gets the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> image that represents the data source.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> image that represents the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> image that represents the data source is typically used in design-time pickers. The image may be `null`.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether the data source is designable.
Docs.value: `true` if the data source is designable; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Indicates whether the data source is designable, meaning that an instance of this type will be added to the design surface when binding. Designable data sources are bound by instance rather than by type. Data sources of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> are designable.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the data source.
Docs.value: The name of the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The name of the data source must be unique across all data sources at the `EnvDTE.Project` level.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the fully qualified type name of the data source.
Docs.value: The fully qualified type name of the data source.
